faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.1.a: Trupasa is a sovereign financial infrastructure that enables governments to establish a digital reserve fully backed by U.S. Treasury Bills, generating risk-free yield to fund public projects without creating inflation.
faqs.2.a: Reserves are fully backed by existing assets (T-Bills) rather than newly issued money. Yield funds projects while the principal remains intact and backed.
faqs.3.a: Through segregated accounts, audited reporting, and institutional-grade controls including KYC/AML and governance oversight.
faqs.4.a: National and subnational governments, and institutional partners seeking transparent, non-inflationary public finance mechanisms.
